# @vuepress/plugin-medium-zoom

medium-zoom 插件

# 安装

yarn add -D @vuepress/plugin-medium-zoom@next
# OR npm install -D @vuepress/plugin-medium-zoom@next

# 使用

module.exports = {
  plugins: ['@vuepress/medium-zoom'] 
}

# 选项

# selector

  • 类型: string
  • 默认值: .content img
